lead_paragraph: New figures are expected to confirm that carbon trading isn’t putting the hoped-for financial pressure on major European polluters.
snippet: New figures are expected to confirm that carbon trading isn’t putting the hoped-for financial pressure on major European polluters.

headline.main: Carbon Permits Said to Be in Excess in Europe
headline.seo: Carbon Permits Said to Be in Excess in Europe
headline.print_headline: Carbon Permits Said to Be in Excess in Europe
